questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A two cones
D) Wildlife and animals

What color are the cones in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is the background color of the surface where the cones are placed?  
A) Blue  
B) Warm green  
C) Red  
D) Yellow

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) Two yellow cones
D) A building

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Water
C) Two yellow cones
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A building
B) A red section of the sports court
C) Trees
D) A street

How many cones are there in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the shape of the cones?
A) Spherical
B) Cubical
C) Conical
D) Cylindrical

What is the texture of the surface where the cones are placed?
A) Rough
B) Smooth
C) Rocky
D) Grassy

What is the predominant color scheme of the photo?  
A) Blue and white  
B) Green and yellow  
C) Red and gray  
D) Black and white

What is the orientation of the cones in relation to each other?
A) They are placed diagonally
B) They are placed side by side
C) They are placed one behind the other
D) They are placed randomly

What is the primary color of the cones?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is the shape of the black bases under the cones?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Hexagonal

What is the relationship between the cones and the surface?
A) The cones are floating
B) The cones are attached to the surface
C) The cones are simply placed on the surface
D) The cones are embedded in the surface

What is the likely material of the cones?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Rubber

What is the likely color of the white lines in the photo?
A) Yellow
B) Blue
C) White
D) Red

What is the primary color of the sports court surface in the foreground?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green and red
D) Yellow

    A) Red
    B) Blue
    C) White
    D) Yellow
